attributes.action: campaign for a 'British Isles Championship' to be held in summer 2008, for our Association Football teams not taking part in the European Championships.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Similar to the 'Home Internationals' that used to take place between England, Wales, Northern Ireland and Scotland and also including The Republic of Ireland.  To compliment the European Championships which have no 'British Isles' representation.
